resources.string:
1. There is Three Sing
 Represented by:
 - Rock = hand fist
 - Paper = hand palm
 - Scissor = Two fingers

 2. How to play
 - Player is you and computer
 - highest points in the round will be win

 3. Point Counts
 - Rock vs Rock = 0 point
 - Paper vs Paper = 0 point
 - Scissor vs Scissor = 0 point
 - Rock vs Paper = Paper wins 1 point
 - Rock vs Scissor = Rock wins 1 point
 - Paper vs Scissor = Scissor wins 1 point

 4. Thank you for playing :)
